name: Automated Sales Prospect Alerts from Sheets to Telegram

parameters.content:
Function: Transforms raw sheet data into user-friendly format
Purpose: Creates clean, organized message structure for notifications

Function: Retrieves lead and sales data from your spreadsheet
Data Types: Customer info, contact details, lead status, sales records

Function: Sends formatted lead information as notifications
Platform: Telegram (as shown by the icon)
Trigger: Automatically sends when new leads are detected
Recipients: Sales team members for quick follow-up

parameters.jsonOutput:
={
  "messageText": "*üéØ NEW LEAD ALERT*\n\n*Company:* {{ $json['Company Name'] }}\n*Contact:* {{ $json['Contact Person'] }}\n*Position:* {{ $json['Job Title'] }}\n*Industry:* {{ $json.Industry }}\n*Location:* {{ $json.Location }}\n\nüìß *Email:* {{ $json.Email }}\nüì± *Phone:* {{ $json.Phone }}\nüîó *Source:* {{ $json['Lead Source'] }}\n\n*Status:* {{ $json.Status === 'New' ? 'üÜï New' : $json.Status === 'Contacted' ? 'üìû Contacted' : $json.Status === 'In Progress' ? '‚è≥ In Progress' : $json.Status === 'Won' ? '‚úÖ Won' : '‚ùå Lost' }}\n\n_Ready to connect with this prospect!_",
  
  "contactInfo": {
    "name": "{{ $json['Contact Person'] }}",
    "company": "{{ $json['Company Name'] }}",
    "email": "{{ $json.Email }}",
    "phone": "{{ $json.Phone }}",
    "cleanPhone": "{{ $json.Phone.replace('+91-', '91').replace('-', '') }}",
    "industry": "{{ $json.Industry }}",
    "location": "{{ $json.Location }}",
    "status": "{{ $json.Status }}",
    "source": "{{ $json['Lead Source'] }}"
  },
  
  "quickActions": {
    "callLink": "tel:{{ $json.Phone.replace('+91-', '') }}",
    "emailLink": "mailto:{{ $json.Email }}?subject=Regarding {{ $json['Company Name'] }} Partnership",
    "whatsappLink": "https://wa.me/{{ $json.Phone.replace('+91-', '91').replace('-', '') }}",
    "linkedinSearch": "https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/people/?keywords={{ $json['Contact Person'] }} {{ $json['Company Name'] }}"
  },
  
  "priority": "{{ $json['Lead Source'] === 'Referral' ? 'HIGH' : $json['Lead Source'] === 'LinkedIn' ? 'MEDIUM' : 'STANDARD' }}",
  
  "statusEmoji": "{{ $json.Status === 'New' ? 'üÜï' : $json.Status === 'Contacted' ? 'üìû' : $json.Status === 'In Progress' ? '‚è≥' : $json.Status === 'Won' ? '‚úÖ' : '‚ùå' }}",
  
  "nextAction": "{{ $json.Status === 'New' ? 'Initial Contact Required' : $json.Status === 'Contacted' ? 'Follow-up Needed' : $json.Status === 'In Progress' ? 'Check Progress' : 'Complete' }}"
}
